FUSO

Teatro y simulacro
Alexandre Perigot
26
at 21h30
Location
[Igreja do Colégio, Ponta Delgada](https://maps.app.goo.gl/75QfK3jM1gpbeJmx8)
Curator Pascale Cassagnau
Session Let’s Dance!

A musical score is performed by three artists using sound effects produced by various everyday objects (assorted objects, vegetables, diverse organic materials). Their bodies become instruments that produce sounds or that function as resonating chambers.
